title: net: resolv.conf rotate option captured but not used
body:
The resolv.conf rotate option is [captured](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/3eb16c059d301bc7242461ac8480d95e433e0374/src/net/dnsconfig_unix.go#L113-L114) when reading config but is [not used](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/3eb16c059d301bc7242461ac8480d95e433e0374/src/net/dnsclient_unix.go#L191) by the Go stub resolver when querying.

Linux's resolv.conf(5) says:

```
rotate sets  RES_ROTATE in _res.options, which causes round-robin selection of name‚Äê
       servers from among those listed.  This has the effect of spreading the  query
       load  among  all listed servers, rather than having all clients try the first
       listed server first every time.
```

cc @captncraig
